summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies backend logic and project metadata, adding/expanding menu/admin/user-profile/access-control related functionality despite no requested requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend domain model and state for products, categories, orders, user profiles, and Google review config.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these appear to be new functionality not requested by the source of truth.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented user profile APIs with authorization checks (get/save caller profile, admin/self access rules).
Implemented/admin-exposed menu seeding function with admin permission enforcement.
Updated project_state.json to describe a new feature request (AR-1) about restoring Admin Dashboard/CMS and reconnecting it to a dynamic Menu page, including architectural notes/known issues.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies no requirements; introducing a pending feature request and related constraints is additional scope not present in the provided BuildRequest.
